statements: UPDATE fashion_designs SET designer_name = 'John Smith', design_sketch = 'Updated sketch' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE fashion_designs SET production_notes = 'Ready for production', fabric_sample = 'New fabric sample' WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE fashion_designs SET designer_name='Alice', design_sketch='New sketch for Spring collection', fabric_sample=X'0123456789ABCDEF', production_notes='Ready for production' WHERE id=1
UPDATE fashion_designs SET production_notes='Needs further refinement', fabric_sample=X'A1B2C3D4E5F6', design_sketch='Final design approved for production', designer_name='Bob' WHERE id=2
UPDATE designers SET designer_name = 'Adam Smith' WHERE designer_id = 1;
UPDATE designs SET design_description = 'Spring Collection 2022' WHERE design_id = 5;
UPDATE designers SET design_sketches='New sketches for 2022 collection', production_notes='Increased production efficiency' WHERE designer_id=101;
UPDATE designs SET design_description='Modern and elegant design', design_image_url='https://example.com/image.jpg' WHERE design_id=201;
UPDATE fashion_designers SET email = 'new_email@example.com' WHERE designer_id = 1;
UPDATE design_sketches SET sketch_description = 'Updated sketch description' WHERE designer_id = 2;
UPDATE fashion_designers SET email = 'new_email@example.com' WHERE designer_id = 1;
UPDATE design_sketches SET sketch_description = 'Updated description', sketch_image = E'\xDEADBEEF' WHERE designer_id = 2;
UPDATE fashion_designers SET designer_name = 'John Doe', fabric_samples = '{"material": "cotton"}' WHERE designer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';

UPDATE design_sketches SET created_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, sketch_image = E'\x89504e470d0a1a0a0000000d49484452000000e0000000e10808000000a37a6d0000000173524774203dcb4850006349455434fbfb02b10ebf888888860f48494600277c4892cc3154545420c0c41cf6...']}}  # Add giant string for image data to keep it visually distinct.
UPDATE designers SET designer_name = 'John Doe' WHERE designer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE fabric_samples SET sample_data = '0xFFD8FFE0' WHERE designer_id = '234e5678-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
UPDATE designers SET design_sketches = 'New sketches data' WHERE designer_id = 'b455700c-4c82-4df3-827a-64233a8756fd';
UPDATE users SET password = 'newpassword' WHERE username = 'john_doe';
